What possible difference does it make if an actor/actress is gay or not?  They're either good at their work, or they're not, just like straight actors.  Besides, if you're going to make stupid, ignorant comments and/or boycott any show or film or theatrical production with a homosexual in it, you're not going to be seeing many shows.  

You know, there are so many other, actually *important* things to get riled up about in the world -- like the constant erosion of liberties in the western world, famine and wars in Africa, over-exploitation of natural resources in Latin and South America, and so on and so on and so on -- why does anyone bother blathering about the fact that an actor on a show being torrented is gay?  If you like the show, then watch it and shut up.  If you don't like the show, what the hell are you doing searching out its torrents and making an ass of yourself?

Sometimes I weep for all the stupidity out there in the world.  I have no idea how we came to be top of the food chain.  (Well, I suppose bacteria and virii really are, when you get right down to it, but we're close.)
